page.title: 06Workforce of Steeple Claydon
page.content: At the last census the{population of {the village was 1600.}We undertook a survey posting questionnaires through every door.Only 30% of these were returned but we consider these to be a representative sample. 25% of the population work in,or very {close to the village.}The village is reasonably self-sufficient and therby generates many jobs.People are employed in various retail outlets,farming,building,transport and the usual household services. 94% of the workforce work{within 20 {miles;}Calvert brickworks and Grendon Prison are large employers while Aylesbury,Buckingham and Bicester provide more employment. 5% of the sample work{within 100 {miles(London);while 1.5% work all over the UK or world wide.Unemployment is comparatively low.
